description:
When another person's negligence results in your or a loved one's personal injury, Anastopoulo Law Firm in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, will help you fight for the compensation and justice you deserve. A personal injury, regardless of how it happens, can cause significant turmoil in your life. From sky-high medical expenses to lost wages to loss of enjoyment of life, your damages may be vast. Our team of skilled attorneys works diligently from day one to build a case that demonstrates the extent of your damages and to ensure the at-fault party assumes full financial responsibility for them.

Our law firm practices exclusively in the area of personal injury law and related areas. Because of this, we provide competent and superior representation to victims and their families who experience the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Products liability
  • Animal bites
  • Birth injury
  • Brain injury
  • Medical malpractice
  • Workers' compensation
  • Wrongful death

Anastopoulo Law Firm has a long-standing reputation for excellence in Myrtle Beach and the surrounding areas. In the 25-plus years since attorney Akim Anastopoulo founded our office, we have recovered millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements on behalf of our clients. Major news sources, including ABC, Fox and NBC, have run stories featuring our work. Whether by offering a free initial consultation or meeting clients where they are at, our team goes above and beyond to ensure our clients' success and comfort at every stage of representation.
